verses.verse: I will bless <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> at all times. <S%H6256><s%> His praise <S%H8416><s%> will always be in my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall boast <S%H1984><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> The humble <S%H6035><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> of it, <S%H8055><s%> and be glad.
Oh magnify <S%H1431><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with me. <S%H7311><s%> Let us exalt his name <S%H8034><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
I sought <S%H1875><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and he answered <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H5337><s%> and delivered me from all my fears. <S%H4035><s%>
They looked <S%H5027><s%> to him, <S%H5102><s%> and were radiant. Their faces <S%H6440><s%> shall never be covered with shame. <S%H2659><s%>
This poor man <S%H6041><s%> cried, <S%H7121><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> him, <S%H3467><s%> and saved him out of all his troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> encamps <S%H2583><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> those who fear <S%H3373><s%> him, <S%H2502><s%> and delivers them.
Oh taste <S%H2938><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is good. <S%H2896><s%> Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> who takes refuge in him. <S%H2620><s%>
Oh fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you his saints, <S%H6918><s%> for there is no lack <S%H4270><s%> with those who fear him. <S%H3373><s%>
The young lions <S%H3715><s%> do lack, <S%H7326><s%> and suffer hunger, <S%H7456><s%> but those who seek <S%H1875><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall not lack <S%H2637><s%> any good thing. <S%H2896><s%>
Come, <S%H3212><s%> you children, <S%H1121><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me. <S%H3925><s%> I will teach you the fear <S%H3374><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Who is someone <S%H376><s%> who desires <S%H2655><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> and loves <S%H157><s%> many days, <S%H3117><s%> that he may see <S%H7200><s%> good? <S%H2896><s%>
Keep <S%H5341><s%> your tongue <S%H3956><s%> from evil, <S%H7451><s%> and your lips <S%H8193><s%> from speaking <S%H1696><s%> lies. <S%H4820><s%>
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil, <S%H7451><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and pursue it. <S%H7291><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s eyes <S%H5869><s%> are toward the righteous. <S%H6662><s%> His ears <S%H241><s%> listen to their cry. <S%H7775><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s face <S%H6440><s%> is against those who do <S%H6213><s%> evil, <S%H7451><s%> to cut off <S%H3772><s%> their memory <S%H2143><s%> from the earth. <S%H776><s%>
The righteous cry, <S%H6817><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hears, <S%H8085><s%> and delivers <S%H5337><s%> them out of all their troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to those who have a broken <S%H7665><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> and saves <S%H3467><s%> those who have a crushed <S%H1793><s%> spirit. <S%H7307><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> are the afflictions <S%H7451><s%> of the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivers him out of them all. <S%H5337><s%>
He protects <S%H8104><s%> all of his bones. <S%H6106><s%> Not one <S%H259><s%> of them <S%H2007><s%> is broken. <S%H7665><s%>
Evil <S%H7451><s%> shall kill <S%H4191><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> Those who hate <S%H8130><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be condemned. <S%H816><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> redeems <S%H6299><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of his servants. <S%H5650><s%> None of those who take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in him shall be condemned. <S%H816><s%>
